mapper.select: SELECT ADDRESS_NO as address_no, SHOPPER_NO as shopper_no, SHIPPING_NAME as shipping_name, SHIPPING_ADDRESS as shipping_address, RECEIVER_TEL as receiver_tel, SHIPPING_PREFERENCE as shipping_preference, ACTIVATE as activate FROM SHIPPING_ADDRESS WHERE SHOPPER_NO = #{shopper_no} AND ACTIVATE = 'Y'
SELECT ADDRESS_NO as address_no, SHIPPING_NAME as name, SHIPPING_ADDRESS as address, RECEIVER_TEL as tel FROM SHIPPING_ADDRESS WHERE SHOPPER_NO = #{shopper_no} AND ACTIVATE = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1
